name: Destroy Korcity
description:
Story:

- Top down tower arena shooter game. Player character is space tower with turret. Every level mission is to destroy all enemies and enemies under limited time. After level passed next level starts and it has double amount enemies. First level include 256 enemies, second 512 etc. Player have also 50 lifes and after all lifes used game start again from level 1. Also game have highscore save system. Gameplay events such as spawning more enemies or lighting effects are synchronized to musical events

Features:

- Enemies to destroy and shooting enemies
- Endless levels. Every level enemies/obstacles count will be doubled
